mapper.select: select s.id, s.content, s.type, s.result, s.status from suggestion s where s.id = #{suggestionId}
mapper.insert: insert into suggestion (id, user_id, content, type, status, submit_time) values (#{id}, #{userId}, #{content}, #{type}, #{status}, #{submitTime})
mapper.update: update suggestion set status = #{status},result = #{result},reply_time = #{replyTime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select count(1) from suggestion where status = 1
